attributes.action: Retain teaching about LGBT in the Relationships Education curriculum.
attributes.additional_details: This is currently the case but there is now a petition to remove such content, which would harm LGBT people.
attributes.background: All children need awareness of differences in sexual and gender identity, both those who diverge from the norm and those who live in the same community. It is vital to retain this in the curriculum

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/631529
